.. _api:

pyflipdot API
=============

HanoverController
-----------------

The HanoverController is the main class used for controlling flipdot signs.

    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:

HanoverSign
-----------

The HanoverSign class defines the specific signs connected to your controller,
allowing them to be individually addressed.
